column4: hmmm my problem does not appear in the ubotu sound links, the sound is too low, anybody know how to solve it?
Mixer settings? Put the computer to suspend before?
the nly fader of the volume control is the PCM, in other computer appear more faders
so double click on the volime icon and check if the pcm level is reasonably high
there is not master fader, there is PCM fader only
ah... seems somehow the Master is set too low, and alsa is confused about your card. type 'alsamixer' in a terminal and see if you get more faders, including a master
the problem is that alsamixer master does not have fader, it has mute only
